data.prayer: Father, let those from the 4,191 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lot-et-Garonne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Lot-et-Garonne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 46 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Lot-et-Garonne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Lot-et-Garonne.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lot-et-Garonne who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Iu Mien people. Make the Iu Mien people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Lot-et-Garonne to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 4,191 believers find a person of peace today among the 336,908 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Lot-et-Garonne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France has a population of 341,100.

We estimate Lot-et-Garonne has 4,191 people who might know Jesus, 208,589 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 128,319 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 128,319 lost people in  Lot-et-Garonne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
